snippet: Valerie Steele, the director of the Museum of the Fashion Institute of Technology, lives with her husband, John S. Major, in a Chelsea loft.
abstract: Valerie Steele, director of the Museum at the Fashion Institute of Technology, loves her Chelsea loft for its black-themed decor.
lead_paragraph: Valerie Steele, the director of the Museum of the Fashion Institute of Technology, lives with her husband, John S. Major, in a Chelsea loft.

headline.seo: At Home With the Director of the Museum of the Fashion Institute of Technology
headline.main: A Backdrop for the Color Black
